contentCreator.title: Content Creator
contentCreator.pageTitle: Content is never enough. It has to be the right content.
contentCreator.paragraph1: Today everyone creates content, but few truly know how to tell a story. The difference lies in strategy, attention to detail, and the ability to transform every post into an opportunity for authentic connection.
contentCreator.paragraph2: As content creators, we develop original, engaging content aligned with your brand identity. Photos, videos, graphics, and texts designed to generate engagement, strengthen your digital presence, and build a loyal community.
contentCreator.paragraph3: We don't produce random content: we study your audience, identify relevant trends, and create materials that communicate effectively. Every piece of content is designed to leave a mark.
contentCreator.paragraph4: Because in the world of social media, you either capture attention or get scrolled past. And we make sure they stop to look.

graphicDesigner.title: Graphic Designer
graphicDesigner.pageTitle: If you're not seen, you don't exist. And on social media, there are no half measures.
graphicDesigner.paragraph1: In a world where image is everything, graphic design isn't just an aesthetic detail—it's the tool that transforms a brand into a memorable visual experience.
graphicDesigner.paragraph2: Every graphic element must communicate with precision and impact: from logos to social media posts, from promotional graphics to digital materials. Everything must be consistent, recognizable, and strategically crafted.
graphicDesigner.paragraph3: With Studio Mua, your brand gains a strong and distinctive visual identity, capable of capturing attention and leaving a lasting impression. We create designs that don't go unnoticed.
graphicDesigner.paragraph4: Because in the digital world, first impressions are what count. And we make them unforgettable.

socialMediaManager.title: Social Media Manager
socialMediaManager.pageTitle: Social media doesn't manage itself. And improvising isn't a strategy.
socialMediaManager.paragraph1: Being present on social media isn't enough: you need a clear strategy, consistent planning, and the ability to transform every interaction into a growth opportunity.
socialMediaManager.paragraph2: As social media managers, we handle everything: from editorial planning to content creation, from daily management to performance analysis. We monitor trends, optimize communication, and build a digital presence that generates concrete results.
socialMediaManager.paragraph3: With Studio Mua, your social media becomes a strategic marketing tool, capable of attracting new customers, building community loyalty, and strengthening your brand reputation.
socialMediaManager.paragraph4: Because managing social media is a full-time job. And we do it for you, with method and creativity.

welcomeSection.title: Welcome to Studio Mua
welcomeSection.paragraph1: Through a strategic combination of Social Media Management, professional Content Creation, and custom Graphic Design, we build an image that doesn't just work—it conquers.
welcomeSection.paragraph2: We believe every brand deserves a digital presence that reflects its personality, values, and ambitions. That's why we develop authentic content, curated visuals, and thoughtful communication designed to generate engagement, strengthen identity, and increase visibility.
welcomeSection.paragraph3: With Studio Mua, your brand doesn't just become "prettier": it becomes immediate, recognizable, and capable of attracting the right attention. It's the ideal choice for those who want to truly stand out, establish their social presence, and build a strong, engaged community.
welcomeSection.closingTitle: Because today, just being there isn't enough: you need to leave your mark.

manifestoSection.paragraph1: I'm not here to follow trends: I'm here to create them.
manifestoSection.paragraph2: I design identities, shape imaginaries, transform shy brands into presences you can't ignore. I'm the one who sees first, imagines better, and delivers everything with a style that doesn't ask permission to exist.
manifestoSection.paragraph3: Graphics, content, social media, strategies: I take what you have and bring it where you never thought possible, but where your brand deserves to be.
manifestoSection.paragraph4: In a world that moves fast, I capture attention. And make it stay.

card1.title: Bold not random
card1.text: We push beyond, but with purpose. Boldness only makes sense when guided by vision, not by chance.
